productions.production: RIC_SQL = SELECT2
SELECT2 = select ws HLIST ws from ws TABLES_LIST WHERE_CLAUSE GROUPBY_CLAUSE ORDERBY_CLAUSE
HLIST = FIELD_OBJ HLIST1 | FUN_CALL HLIST1 | star
HLIST1 = comma HLIST | epsilon
FUN_CALL = SPACE fun_head open_par FIELD_OBJ1 SPACE close_par
FIELD_OBJ1 = SPACE item
FIELD_OBJ = SPACE item FIELD_OBJ_POINT ASFIELD_OBJ
FIELD_OBJ_POINT = point item | epsilon
ASFIELD_OBJ = ws as ws FIELD_OBJ1 | epsilon
FIELD_LIST = FIELD FIELD_LIST1
FIELD_LIST1 = comma FIELD_LIST | epsilon
TABLE = SPACE item
TABLES_LIST = TABLE TABLES_LIST1 | SPACE open_par TABLES_LIST close_par
TABLES_LIST1 = comma TABLES_LIST_SIMPLE | TABLES_LIST_CX1 | epsilon
TABLES_LIST_SIMPLE = SPACE TABLE TABLES_LIST_SIMPLE1
TABLES_LIST_SIMPLE1 = comma TABLES_LIST_SIMPLE | epsilon
TABLES_LIST_CX = SPACE open_par TABLES_LIST_CX1 close_par | TABLES_LIST_CX1
TABLES_LIST_CX1 = TABLES_LIST_CX1_INNER TABLES_LIST_CX | TABLES_LIST_CX1_LEFT TABLES_LIST_CX | epsilon
TABLES_LIST_CX1_INNER = SPACE inner ws join ws TABLE ws ON_CLAUSE
TABLES_LIST_CX1_LEFT = SPACE left ws join ws TABLE ws ON_CLAUSE
ON_CLAUSE = SPACE on ws EXPRL | epsilon
PARS = SPACE open_par SPACE EXPRL SPACE close_par EXPR2
EXPRITEM = SPACE FIELD EXPR1 | SPACE num EXPR1 | SPACE sstring EXPR1
EXPRL = PARS | EXPRITEM SPACE relop SPACE EXPRITEM
EXPR1 = SPACE OPS EXPRITEM | epsilon
EXPR2 = SPACE OPS SPACE PARS | epsilon
OPS = op | star
FIELD = item FIELD1
FIELD1 = point item | epsilon
WHERE_CLAUSE = ws where ws EXPRL | epsilon
GROUPBY_CLAUSE = ws group ws by ws GROUPBY_CLAUSE1 | epsilon
GROUPBY_CLAUSE1 = SPACE FIELD_LIST
ORDERBY_CLAUSE = ws order ws by ws ORDERBY_CLAUSE1 | epsilon
ORDERBY_CLAUSE1 = SPACE FIELD_LIST SPACE
